name: Snoop Dogg Boxing
summary: Snoop Dogg Boxing puts you up against a posse of bad boys, each with a special move to bust you up. These guys are the kings of the ring. It’s a classic arcade style boxing game where you show up without street credibility, fight your way up the ranks, earn respect and ultimately face the king of the hip hop ring, Snoop Dogg, at the final level of the game. Round for round, this game paid the cost to be the boss of all mobile boxing games.
